title: Defensive Showdowns
description:
Wendi Nix, Mike Golic, and Trevor Matich talk the upcoming games of the weekend that will feature big time defensive showdown. The crew also talks what Bo Nix and the Auburn Tigers have to do to overcome the juggernaut that is Georgia's defense.

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The CFB Live crew kick-off discuss this week's matchups that feature strong supporting casts on defense.
